txt_en: The best cure is the laughing cure.
txt_cn: 笑容治愈一切。

txt_en: We humans are alone in this world for a reason.
txt_cn: 独行于世，自有其因。

txt_en: Sometimes what you want is right in front of you.
txt_cn: 你想要的，就在前方。

txt_en: You can't undo the past. All you can do is face what's ahead.
txt_cn: 往事随风，把握当下。

txt_en: Memories connect humans even when they are apart.
txt_cn: 即便分离，回忆仍能连接你我。

txt_en: You can't change the world, but you can change yourself.
txt_cn: 你无法改变世界，但你可以改变自己。

txt_en: We make ourselves who we are.
txt_cn: 我们的人生由自己创造。

txt_en: Even if we make mistakes, we can try to make things right.
txt_cn: 即使犯下错误，我们也能尽力改正。

txt_en: You have to be open to love.
txt_cn: 要学会接纳爱意。

txt_en: Love conquers all.
txt_cn: 爱能战胜一切。

txt_en: Life is one grand, sweet song, so start the music.
txt_cn: 生活如歌，谱写美妙人生。

txt_en: Victory comes in defending what we know is right.
txt_cn: 坚守正义，胜利终将来临。

txt_en: The future belongs to those who know where they belong.
txt_cn: 明确定位，未来可期。

txt_en: We prize things most when we've lost them.
txt_cn: 人总是失去时才懂得珍惜。

txt_en: Anyone can make their future whatever they want it to be.
txt_cn: 你的未来，由你打造。

txt_en: You can't let the mistakes of the past determine your future.
txt_cn: 不要让过去的错误决定你的未来。

txt_en: The only person standing in your way is you.
txt_cn: 唯一能够阻碍你的人是你自己。

txt_en: What makes life valuable is that it doesn't last forever.
txt_cn: 正因岁月短暂，人生才弥足珍贵。

txt_en: The more difficult something became, the more rewarding it was in the end.
txt_cn: 事情越难，最终的收获也越大。

txt_en: The rain brings life. So does the sun.
txt_cn: 雨水带来生机，阳光亦如此。

txt_en: Change begins with persistence and commitment.
txt_cn: 改变始于坚持和付出。

txt_en: We're not put on this Earth to think of only ourselves.
txt_cn: 人生在世，不能只考虑自己。

txt_en: It takes guts to make change.
txt_cn: 做出改变需要勇气。

txt_en: One has to adapt to survive.
txt_cn: 要想生存，就要学会适应。

txt_en: There is no fate but what we make for ourselves.
txt_cn: 一切尚未定局，未来由我们自己创造。

txt_en: What matters is what you do, not what you think.
txt_cn: 行动比空想更重要。

txt_en: My courage always rises with every attempt to intimidate me.
txt_cn: 凡试图打败我的，皆让我勇气倍增。

txt_en: You have a chance to write your own story.
txt_cn: 你的故事由你书写。
